posts.text: æ•™ä½ åˆ¶ä½œç‚«é…·çš„htmlçƒŸèŠ±ç‰¹æ•ˆâ€‹ æƒ³åœ¨htmlä¸­åšå‡ºçƒŸèŠ±ç‰¹æ•ˆå—ï¼Ÿè®©æˆ‘ä»¬å¼€å§‹å§ï¼é¦–å…ˆï¼Œåœ¨æ¡Œé¢ä¸Šæ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œæ–‡æ¡£åéšæ„ç„¶åï¼Œè¿›å…¥æ–‡æ¡£ç¼–è¾‘ï¼ŒæŠŠä¸‹åˆ—ä»£ç å¤åˆ¶è¿›å»<!doctype html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>SUPER FIREWORKS!</title> </head> <body> <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Fireworks</title> <style type="text/css"> body{ background:#000; margin:0; width:100%; overflow:hidden; } </style> </head> <body> <canvas>#FFFFFF</canvas> <script> alert("BE READY TO BE SUPRISED~"); var t = 0; var c = document.querySelector("canvas"); var $ = c.getContext('2d'); c.width = window.innerWidth; c.height = window.innerHeight; $.fillStyle = 'hsla(0,0%,0%,1)'; window.addEventListener('resize', function() { c.width = window.innerWidth; c.height = window.innerHeight; }, false); function draw() { $.globalCompositeOperation = 'source-over'; $.fillStyle = 'hsla(0,0%,0%,.1)'; $.fillRect(0, 0, c.width, c.height); var foo, i, j, r; foo = Math.sin(t) * 2 * Math.PI; for (i=0; i<400; i++) { r = 400 * Math.sin(i * foo); $.globalCompositeOperation = ''; $.fillStyle = 'hsla(' + i + 12 + ',100%, 60%,1)'; $.beginPath(); $.arc(Math.sin(i) * r + (c.width / 2), Math.cos(i) * r + (c.height / 2), 1.5, 0, Math.PI * 2); $.fill(); } //this controls the effect // â†“â†“â†“ t += 0.000005; return t %= 2 * Math.PI;//MATH.PIï¼šÏ€ }; function run() { window.requestAnimationFrame(run); draw(); } run(); </script> </body> </html> </body> </html>é€€å‡ºä¿å­˜ï¼Œæ–‡ä»¶åç¼€æ”¹ä¸º .htmlæ‰“å¼€æ¬£èµç¾å¦™çš„çƒŸèŠ±å§PSï¼šæœ‰ç‚¹å‚¬çœ ï¼Œå¯æ‹¿å»å½“å±ä¿ã€æ»‘ç¨½ã€‘
